meta.description: Warehouse rental optimization for a factory over 4 months

sets.name: MONTHS
sets.description: Months for which warehouse space is needed

params.name: required_area
params.description: Required warehouse area for each month

params.name: rental_fee
params.description: Rental fee per m^2 for each contract period

vars.name: x
vars.description: x[m][p] = area rented in month m for period p

objective.name: min_total_rental_fee
objective.expr: sum(rental_fee[p] * x[m][p] for m in MONTHS for p in PERIODS)

constraints.name: satisfy_demand_month_1
constraints.description: Satisfy warehouse area demand for month 1

constraints.name: satisfy_demand_month_2
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['1'][p] for p in ['2', '3', '4']) + sum(x['2'][p] for p in PERIODS)
constraints.description: Satisfy warehouse area demand for month 2

constraints.name: satisfy_demand_month_3
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['1'][p] for p in ['3', '4']) + sum(x['2'][p] for p in ['2', '3', '4']) + sum(x['3'][p] for p in PERIODS)
constraints.description: Satisfy warehouse area demand for month 3

constraints.name: satisfy_demand_month_4
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['1']['4']) + sum(x['2'][p] for p in ['3', '4']) + sum(x['3'][p] for p in ['2', '3', '4']) + sum(x['4'][p] for p in PERIODS)
constraints.description: Satisfy warehouse area demand for month 4
